page.title: 11HOUSING ON CLIFTON ESTATE
page.content: Clifton is as big as a small town.It has a population of about{30,000} people.The Estate was built as an overspill area for Nottingham afer the Second World War.Building started in 1951 and there are now about{8,900 {dwellings}of which{3,452 have been {sold privately.}It was the largest housing estate in{Europe}in the 60's. The estate is about 4 miles from the city centre.There is a selection of accomodation including 2,3 and 4 bedroomed houses,1 and 2 bedroom bungalows and 1,2 and 3 bedroom flats.Dotted around Clifton are Warden-aided flats for the elderly.On Southchurch Drive there is{ {"Southchurch Court"}a multi-storied block of flats.Most houses are "No-fines"concrete except 64 acres around{Glapton}which are brick.
